thread.title: Kyle Sandilands, 45, admits that he is lazy in bed | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kyle Sandilands, 45, admits that he is lazy in bed | Daily Mail Online

author: Jade Watkins
title: Kyle Sandilands, 45, admits that he is lazy in bed | Daily Mail Online
text: comments He has been enjoying a relationship with his much younger girlfriend Imogen Anthony, 26, for a number of years now. And in a VERY revealing interview on Friday, Kyle Sandliands has admitted he is lazy when it comes to their bedroom antics. The 45-year-old made the revelation during his Kyle and Jackie O radio show. 'I just lay there': Kyle Sandilands has admitted that he is lazy when it comes to sex life with younger girlfriend Imogen Anthony, 26 'I’ve become a selfish lover. I just lay back there,' he admitted on-air. 'I don’t care, I don’t even mind that I’m selfish. I used to put a big effort in, but now, no effort. Nothing,' he added. This is not the first time Kyle has overshared details of his sex life with Imogen on his KIIS FM breakfast show. Last year, he told a graphic story to Jackie O when she asked him when he last got hot and heavy with his ladylove. X-rated: Imogen is known for posting topless shots of herself on her Instagram page In bed with Imogen: The 26-year-old often takes selfies from the bed she shares with Kyle Wild child: Kyle's longtime girlfriend, seen here at Burning Man last year, is known for her racy ensembles and wild child behaviour 'It was the weekend,' Kyle admitted to Jackie during the chat. 'I got up and went to feed the animals and she grabbed my arm and said "no, no" and I know what that means.' Adding to his confession, Kyle added somewhat distastefully: 'So I thrashed her in there and then went to feed the animals.' Flashing the flesh: The bold model prefers to take the 'no clothes' option on most occasions Free! The blonde beauty likes to go topless any chance she gets Kyle then went on to say the fun would have to stop during that week due to 'that time of month' for his model girlfriend. 'Too much information?' Kyle asked Jackie. 'You're not one to hold back,' Jackie replied bemused. Imogen once spoke to Daily Mail Australia about her partner's inability to hold censor himself, saying: 'He blurts out everything, but it's fine.' Shirtless: Meanwhile, Kyle stripped off his top while discussing his weight on The Morning Show last year The model did admit the her beau does speak to her in advance if he plans to reveal an extremely private matter to fans on the show. 'He has kind of spoken to me beforehand,' she confessed. 'Anything vulgar like that, he needs a pass. There has been a few things where he has said "can I do this?" and I was like "you cannot",' she explained. Tatt's huge: Imogen got a 'Metal Baby' and spitting cobra tattoo on Thursday night
